title: How to Make Plain Cheesecake with Chocolate Shavings on Top

steps.headline: Filling is First!
steps.description: In your mixing bowl, add 16 ounces of softened cream cheese, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup of sugar and a tsp. of vanilla extract.

steps.headline: Mix for about 15 minutes until it is smooth.
Crummy Crust!
steps.description: In a different bowl, put in 12 crushed cinnamon graham crackers and 6 tbsp. of melted butter. Also add 1/4 cup of sugar and mix everything together.

steps.headline: When you squeeze the crust in a ball, and it sticks, you are ready to put it in the pan.
Put parchment paper on the bottom of the pan.
steps.description: Add the crust into the pan.

steps.headline: Remember the filling?
steps.description: Pour the filling onto the crust. Scrape the sides to make sure all of the filling comes out.

steps.headline: Topping Time!
steps.description: For the topping, put in 8 ounces of sour cream, 1 tsp. of vanilla extract, and 1/4 cup of sugar.

steps.headline: Pour the topping over the cake.
Once the cake has cooled completely, sprinkle shavings of your favorite chocolate.
Cover with foil, and refrigerate  overnight.

text: Preheat oven to 375 Degrees.  Filling is First! In your mixing bowl, add 16 ounces of softened cream cheese, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup of sugar and a tsp. of vanilla extract. Mix for about 15 minutes until it is smooth.  Crummy Crust! In a different bowl, put in 12 crushed cinnamon graham crackers and 6 tbsp. of melted butter. Also add 1/4 cup of sugar and mix everything together. When you squeeze the crust in a ball, and it sticks, you are ready to put it in the pan.  Put parchment paper on the bottom of the pan. Add the crust into the pan. Remember the filling? Pour the filling onto the crust. Scrape the sides to make sure all of the filling comes out. Bake for about 20 minutes.  Topping Time! For the topping, put in 8 ounces of sour cream, 1 tsp. of vanilla extract, and 1/4 cup of sugar. Mix.  Pour the topping over the cake.  Smooth it out.  Bake at 475 Degrees for 10 minutes.  Once the cake has cooled completely, sprinkle shavings of your favorite chocolate.  Cover with foil, and refrigerate  overnight.  Finished!
